pages.text: And Our command is only once, like a blink of an eye
And We have certainly destroyed your kinds, so does anyone take notice
And everything they did is in the books
And everything small or big is written
And indeed those who control themselves will be in gardens and rivers
In a seat of truth, with a mighty ruler
The beneficent
taught the Quran
created the human being
taught him the speech
The sun and the moon with precisely calculated (courses)
The herb (or the star) and the tree both humble themselves (before Him)
And He raised the sky and set up the balance
that you do not outdo the balance
And perform the weighing with justice and do not make the scale light
And He set up the earth for the human race
in it there are fruits and palm trees having coverings
and the seed having outer shell, and the fragrant herbs
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
He created the human being from dried clay like pottery clay
And He created the Jinn from flame of a fire
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
